<title level="1" pfs="">[Lophiithu](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1415)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Lophiithus dwell in the deepest ocean trenches, places untouched by light, hope, or mortal comprehension. They appear to be gaping maws with distended jaws, vestigial flaps of putrefying flesh, and filamentous tentacles tipped with glowing light. Their extraplanar mouths take up most of their bodies, leaving no room for other organs, and any prey they swallow is transported to the [Maelstrom](/Planes.aspx?ID=19) for digestion.

([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 44

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 42

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39
</column>

</column>

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 21">[Lophiithu](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1415)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />

<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 83</row>

**Perception** +38; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Alghollthu](/Languages.aspx?ID=24), [Aquan](/Languages.aspx?ID=14), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet, [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +36, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +40, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +43, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +40, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +36

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +10

**Con** +7

**Int** +10

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +7
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 43 

**Fort** +30 

**Ref** +36 

**Will** +38 

</row>

**HP** 400

**Resistances**
[mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) 20, precision 15

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet, swim 80 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +39 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [deadly 3d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 4d12+18 piercing plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
lure +37 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 40 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 4d6+18 bludgeoning plus 2d6 mental and beguiling lure

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 41
- **Cantrips (9th)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61)
- **8th**
[Illusory Creature](/Spells.aspx?ID=158) (×2), [Phantasmal Killer](/Spells.aspx?ID=219) (×2)
- **9th**
[Telepathic Demand](/Spells.aspx?ID=336) (×2), [Unfathomable Song](/Spells.aspx?ID=349) (×2)
- **10th**
[Fabricated Truth](/Spells.aspx?ID=106), [Gate](/Spells.aspx?ID=130) (at will)
- **Constant (9th)**
[Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Beguiling Lure**  ([Illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) A creature hit by a lophiithu's lure must succeed at a DC 41 Will save or be [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14) with the lophiithu's lures for 1 minute. On a critical failure, it can't use reactions while it remains fascinated. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

**Dimensional Swallow**   The lophiithu's digestive organs exist in the [Maelstrom](/Planes.aspx?ID=19), regardless of the location of their external form. The lophiithu can swallow any number of creatures of any size. Creatures that [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) the lophiithu's stomach do so normally. Creatures that cut themselves free instead find themselves in the Maelstrom near nothing but one of the lophiithu's disembodied stomachs. When the lophiithu dies, their stomach becomes a rift connecting to their mouth, allowing a creature to return to their plane. This rift disappears after 1 minute.

**Lure Whip** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The lophiithu makes a lure Strike against each creature within reach. These attacks count toward the lophiithu's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after these attacks.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" />  Gargantuan, 3d12+10 bludgeoning, Rupture 44 and dimensional swallow

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Planar Digestion</title>

A lophiithu's stomachs are scattered across islands in the [Maelstrom](/Planes.aspx?ID=19). Extraplanar scholars remain unclear as to how these stomachs grow independently of a lophiithu, but are unsurprised by the planar abilities of the stomachs. Expeditions into the Maelstrom have turned up stomachs ranging from as small as a human fist to as large as mountains, suggesting the existence of enormous lophiithus.
</aside>
